channel.title: Omfg what should i do ! jagex is gona sue me
channel.description:
Date: Wed, 20 Jan 2010 08:13:44 +0000 From: Mark Soulghsburgh <jagexlaw@live.com> Reply-To: Mark Soulghsburgh <jagexlaw@live.com> Subject: Rune-Revouliton To: Rune-Revouliton@hotmail.co.uk
Hi there korey After several thorough scans of your internet protocol address, we have found this email address to be the most used.Thus emailing you by this contact email. This email is regarding a recently created "Runescape private server" which we have found, is owned by you.We like the fact that you admire the game so much to create your own version, but you are breaking approximately 27 laws under the copyright act. 1994. The copyright act of 1994 states that: Any raw material replicated by an unofficial owner is unlawful under the copyright act 1994.This is a crime punishable by: -Maximum jail sentence of 10 years. -Minimum jail sentence of 2 months -Fined a maximum sum of $300,000 -Fined a minimum sum of $1,000 -Sentenced to community service, -Maximum hours 2,000 hours -Minimum hours 50 hours JageX does not enjoy taking matters to the final extent, but should it be the case, we are forced to do so. Here is an official statement inquiring that your server be closed for good, or you be sued by JageX: "We, JageX, Owner of FunOrb entertainment and Runescape - The massive online adventure game by JageX Games Studio, hear by create a claim of copyright act breach. The following names will be prosecuted to the full extent under the afformentioned sentences: Names cannot be provided due to legal conditions. JageX are the official owners of all runescape material, raw or edited, and we do not ad hear to the exploitation found in a "Private server". We are informing you, that you have 1 month to comply with our request, or be prosecuted without mercy" I am Mark Soulghsburgh, Official leading lawyer of Jagex Online Studio,And this is an official legal binding message given out to any person(s) exploiting my clients. Thank you Kind regards,Mark Soulghsburgh.
any thoughts

item.title: Omfg what should i do ! jagex is gona sue me
item.dc:creator: @Lord_of_fallen_Angel Lord of fallen Angels
item.description:
@Lord_of_fallen_Angel wrote:

Change your IP, and do not login with your Email, or RuneScape account using it.

Change your NO-IP.
Create a new Email, and use it under No-IP.

Then they cannot find you. Unless, your real information as to of where you live is in your Email.

Read full topic

@deathschaos9 wrote:

The email address ends in @live.com. Jagex uses @jagex.com, also, Jagex will never contact you using email. If they were going to sue you they would contact you another way. Its a fake, your fine.

item.title: Omfg what should i do ! jagex is gona sue me
item.dc:creator: @koreybarnett koreybarnett
item.description:
@koreybarnett wrote:

Date: Wed, 20 Jan 2010 08:13:44 +0000
From: Mark Soulghsburgh jagexlaw@live.com
Reply-To: Mark Soulghsburgh jagexlaw@live.com
Subject: Rune-Revouliton
To: Rune-Revouliton@hotmail.co.uk

Hi there korey
After several thorough scans of your internet protocol address, we
have found this email address to be the most used.Thus emailing you by
this contact email.
This email is regarding a recently created “Runescape private server”
which we have found, is owned by you.We like the fact that you admire
the game so much to create your own version, but you are breaking
approximately 27 laws under the copyright act. 1994.
The copyright act of 1994 states that:
Any raw material replicated by an unofficial owner is unlawful under
the copyright act 1994.This is a crime punishable by:
-Maximum jail sentence of 10 years. -Minimum jail sentence of 2
months -Fined a maximum sum of $300,000 -Fined a minimum sum of $1,000
-Sentenced to community service, -Maximum hours 2,000 hours
-Minimum hours 50 hours JageX does not enjoy taking matters to the
final extent, but should it be the case, we are forced to do so.
Here is an official statement inquiring that your server be closed for
good, or you be sued by JageX:
“We, JageX, Owner of FunOrb entertainment and Runescape - The massive
online adventure game by JageX Games Studio, hear by create a claim of
copyright act breach. The following names will be prosecuted to the
full extent under the afformentioned sentences: Names cannot be
provided due to legal conditions.
JageX are the official owners of all runescape material, raw or
edited, and we do not ad hear to the exploitation found in a “Private
server”. We are informing you, that you have 1 month to comply with
our request, or be prosecuted without mercy”
I am Mark Soulghsburgh, Official leading lawyer of Jagex Online
Studio,And this is an official legal binding message given out to any
person(s) exploiting my clients.
Thank you Kind regards,Mark Soulghsburgh.
